_.storage_is_encrypted: Ukugcinwa kwakho kubhaliwe. Inombolo yokuvula iyadingeka ukuba ichithwe

lnd.sameWalletAsInvoiceError: : Awukwazi ukuhlawula i-invoyisi kunye ngengxowa oyisebenzisile ukudala leyo invoyisi.
lnd.title: lawula imali

plausibledeniability.create_password_explanation: Inombolo yakho yokuvula igumbi lokugcina inkohliso akumele ifane ne nombolo yokuvula  igumbi lakho  elinyanisekileyo
plausibledeniability.help: Phantsi kweemeko unokunyaneliswa ukuba uchaze a inombolo yokuvula. BlueWallet ukugcina imali yakho ikhuselekile, unokudala enye ukugcinwa kwekhowudi, ngegama eligqithisiweyo. Phantsi kwefuthe, unako ukutyhila le phasiwedi kumntu wesithatu. Ukuba ungenayo BlueWallet, iya kuvula ukugcinwa kwetyala ‘entsha’. Oku kuya kubonakala Umlenze kumntu wesithathu kodwa uza kugcina ngasese ukugcinwa kwakho ngemali ekhuselekile..
plausibledeniability.help2: Igumbi lokugcina elitsha liza kusebenza ngokupheleleyo, kwaye unako ukugcina okunye ‘ + ‘lxabiso elincinci apho likhangeleka ngakumbi.
plausibledeniability.password_should_not_match: Inombolo yakho yokuvula igumbi lokugcina inkohliso akumele ifane ne nombolo yokuvula  igumbi lakho  elinyanisekileyo
plausibledeniability.title: Ukuphika

send.create_this_is_hex: Le yi ntengo hex, ityikityiwe ilungele ukukhutshelwa kumnatha.

settings.lightning_settings_explain: Ukuxhuma kwi-node yakho ye-LND nceda ufake iLndHub kwaye ufake iURL apha izicwangciso. Shiya kungenanto yokusebenzisa iLndHub (Indhub.io)
settings.password_explain: Ukudala iinombolo yokuvula oyisebenzisayo ukucima ukugcina

wallets.import_error: Ayiphumelelanga ukungenisa. Nceda, uqiniseka ukuba idata ehlinzekiweyo iyasebenza.
wallets.import_explanation: Bhale apha imnemonic yakho, ngundoqo, WIF , okanye nantoni na onayo. BlueWallet uya kwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqiqa ifomathi efanelekileyo kwaye ingenise ingxowa yakho
